name: 10.19 "Rich Man, Wood Man" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 10 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Woody go on vacation?
questions.explanation:
London.

	He went for two weeks. Mr. Gaines (Kelly's father) paid for the entire trip.

questions.text: Who was going on a strict exercise and diet regime?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	He told the others so they would hold him accountable. He didn't want to give up.

questions.text: What did Carla call Woody upon his return to Cheers?
questions.explanation:
Oliver Twit.

	Woody came in and said, "Hi-ho chaps". Carla, of course, was making reference to Dickens famous character from England, Oliver Twist.

questions.text: Who's the couple Woody and Kelly met coming back from vacation?
questions.explanation:
David and Arlene.

	Sam wanted Woody to hang out at the bar. Woody said, "Love to, can't," and then explained about David and Arlene.

questions.text: Who's raising money for his class trip?
questions.explanation:
Lud.

	His class was going to Colonial Williamsburg. Carla was helping her son raise the money. Frasier was angry Lud didn't have the candy bars right away because Frasier just finished a hard workout.

questions.text: How many bars of candy did Rebecca buy?
questions.explanation:
5.

	She wasn't going to buy any because she thought Carla was taking advantage of them. However, Lud held his breath for a really long time until she gave in and bought some.

Rebecca.

	Woody told her, "Say it don't spray it. This is cashmere, Miss Howe." Rebecca became angry with him saying, "I knew you when you were an ignorant farm boy...that was about a week and a half ago."

questions.text: What did Woody call himself, that made him see he was changing like the others said?
questions.explanation:
Woody Gaines.

	Woody's last name is Boyd. However, hanging around his rich girlfriend, Kelly Gaines, he forgot who he really was for a short time.

questions.text: What did Norm say to Kelly when she was crying?
questions.explanation:
There, there.

	He tried to ignore it at first, but when he couldn't he said, "O Kelly, there, there." Kelly thanked him for reaching out to her.

questions.text: Who got mugged on the subway?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Kelly loved riding the subway but Woody got mugged when he went on it. Woody decided that Kelly shouldn't give up her money for him. It was decided they'd be a two income family, she'd live off her income and he'd live off his.
